definition: insect that eats into books, clothing etc/moth-eaten/worm-eaten
lower form of animal life, including insects, insect larvae, worms and similar creatures/CL:條|条[tiao2],隻|只[zhi1]/(fig.) person with a particular undesirable characteristic

sentences.english: The advances in utilization of pheromones for integrated management of bark beetles are reviewed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 綜述了信息素在小蠹蟲綜合治理中的應用進展。

sentences.english: This piece of cloth was eaten by a moth.
